title: Monday Pt1: Tua Returns, Breece Hall Injury, Giants are 6-1, Dak wins, and Chiefs Roll
itunes:title: Monday Pt1: Tua Returns, Breece Hall Injury, Giants are 6-1, Dak wins, and Chiefs Roll
description:
Part One of the Good Morning Football Podcast begins with Tua Tagovailoa's return to the Dolphins. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty dissect how the Miami defense was actually what won the game against the Steelers.  After getting updates on injuries for Breece Hall and DK Metcalf, we examine the Giants being 6-1 and the Buccaneers shocking 3-4 record. Dak Prescott returned for the Cowboys in a win over the Lions while Christian McCaffrey joined the 49ers but it didn't make much difference against the Chiefs!

Stay tuned for Aaron Rodgers reaction to another loss and Statement wins coming in Part Two!

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Stay tuned for Aaron Rodgers reaction to another loss and Statement wins coming in Part Two!
